title: A/B Test Thumbnail Images for a VOD Title
description: A streaming service wants to determine which thumbnail image for a new movie generates a higher click-through rate.

tasks.description: Identify the movie and the two candidate thumbnail images (A and B).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the asset ID and the two image files.

tasks.description: Set up an A/B test to show thumbnail A to 50% of users and thumbnail B to the other 50%.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully configures the A/B test in the system.

tasks.description: After 24 hours, analyze the click-through rate for both thumbnails.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds that thumbnail B has a 15% higher click-through rate.

tasks.description: Set the winning thumbnail (B) as the default for all users.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the movie's metadata to use the winning thumbnail.
